title: Option To Turn Off Music In Champ Select
body: I love the champ select music, but its so loud some times. I love to listen to podcasts while I play and it makes me not able to listen until the game starts because I can't hear it cause the champ select music is so overpowering. Thanks!

replies.body: I can say that I'm planning for this with the new client - hang tight!
Are you also allowing to turn off the teambuilder music? Because that gets annoying when you have to listen to it for 10+ minutes.
This section really needs a pinned FAC (Frequently Addressed Complaints) thread.

Bump.

What I dislike about this is that you can't control the volume inside of champ select. What happens is you can't focus if it's too loud, and turning down league itself isn't a good solution because if you forget you turned it down, then you may not hear the game start. It's just very loud and needs to be nerfed. lol
I was thinking this myself when I was trying to listen to the other League of Legends music.
i dont like the music itself
